DESCRIPTION: A powerful poison that deals 2 damage each turn, but doesn't last as long.
Orb: Gives adjacent orbs #b+2 #yFocus. When #yEvoked, if you have fewer than #b3 orb slots, gain an orb slot. NL #yPassive effect is not affected by #yFocus.
Orb: At the start of your turn, gain #b+2 #yStrength until the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, applies 1 #yVulnerable to a random enemy.
Orb: No #yPassive effect. When #yEvoked while you have more than #b3 orb slots, consumes your leftmost orb slot and #yEvokes the occupying orb.
Goes down by 1 each round, is removed on 0. NL While active, completely blocking Attack damage reflects it back at the attacker.
An alternate form of #yBlock that is not lost at the end of each round.
Fighters with #yLanguid deal 1 less #yAttack damage per stack. NL Is reduced by #b1 at the end of each turn.
#yStatus: Deals #b4 damage and #yExhausts at the end of your turn. NL Affected by your own damage modifiers.
Orb: At the start of your turn, gain #b3 #yCharge-Up. NL When #yEvoked, gain [e] and #b5 #yCharge-Up.
Fighters afflicted by #yDecrepit suffer 1 extra damage from attacks for each stack. NL Each turn #yDecrepit is decreased by #b1.
While in this #yStance, you gain double #yBlock from cards, but your #yAttack damage is reduced by #r90%.
